# CutiePawsPedia

> CutiePawsPedia is Europe's leading pet services directory, helping pet owners find trusted veterinarians, groomers, pet hotels, trainers, and more. With 200,000+ verified listings across 12 countries, we connect pets with the care they deserve.

## About

CutiePawsPedia is a comprehensive, multilingual pet services directory serving pet owners across Europe and North America. Our mission is to make finding quality pet care simple and trustworthy.

### Key Features
- 200,000+ pet service listings
- Verified business profiles with real reviews
- Coverage in 12 countries
- Available in 6 languages (Dutch, German, English, French, Spanish, Italian)
- E-E-A-T compliant content with real business information
- Interactive maps and search functionality
- Dog food calculator and other pet tools
- Annual CutiePawsPedia Awards

## Categories

We cover all major pet service categories:

- **Veterinary** - General veterinarians and pet clinics
- **Emergency Vet** - 24/7 emergency veterinary care
- **Exotic Vet** - Specialists for exotic pets (reptiles, birds, small mammals)
- **Grooming** - Dog and cat grooming services
- **Pet Store** - Pet supplies, food, and accessories
- **Pet Hotel** - Overnight pet boarding facilities
- **Dog Training** - Professional dog trainers and obedience classes
- **Dog Walking** - Dog walking and exercise services
- **Pet Sitting** - In-home pet care while you're away
- **Dog Daycare** - Daytime supervision and socialization
- **Animal Shelter** - Pet adoption centers and rescue organizations
- **Breeder** - Registered and ethical pet breeders
- **Dog Park** - Off-leash dog parks and exercise areas
- **Pet Boarding** - Short and long-term pet accommodation

## Geographic Coverage

### Countries
- Netherlands (NL) - Primary market
- Belgium (BE)
- Germany (DE)
- Austria (AT)
- Switzerland (CH)
- United Kingdom (GB)
- Ireland (IE)
- France (FR)
- Luxembourg (LU)
- Spain (ES)
- Italy (IT)
- United States (US)

### Major Cities
Each country has comprehensive coverage of major cities and regions. Examples include:
- Netherlands: Amsterdam, Rotterdam, The Hague, Utrecht, Eindhoven
- Germany: Berlin, Munich, Hamburg, Frankfurt, Cologne
- UK: London, Manchester, Birmingham, Edinburgh, Glasgow
- France: Paris, Lyon, Marseille, Nice, Toulouse
- Spain: Madrid, Barcelona, Valencia, Seville, Bilbao
- Italy: Rome, Milan, Naples, Turin, Florence

## Languages

Content is available in:
- Dutch (nl) - Default for NL, BE
- German (de) - DE, AT, CH
- English (en) - GB, IE, US
- French (fr) - FR, LU, BE
- Spanish (es) - ES
- Italian (it) - IT

## URL Structure

```
https://cutiepawspedia.com/{locale}/{country}/{city}/{category}/{place}
```

Examples:
- Homepage: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl`
- Country page: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands`
- City page: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands/amsterdam`
- Category in city: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands/amsterdam/veterinary`
- Business detail: `https://cutiepawspedia.com/nl/netherlands/amsterdam/veterinary/dierenkliniek-name`

## Special Pages

- `/blog` - Pet care articles and guides
- `/awards/{year}` - Annual CutiePawsPedia Awards
- `/search` - Advanced search with filters
- `/{country}/map` - Interactive map of pet services
- `/{country}/top/{category}` - Top-rated businesses by category
- `/{country}/best/{category}` - Best businesses in each category
- `/{country}/new` - Recently added businesses
- `/tools/dog-food-calculator` - Dog nutrition calculator
- `/compare/{city1}-vs-{city2}/{category}` - City comparisons

## Business Information

Each business listing includes:
- Name and address
- Contact information (phone, email, website)
- Opening hours
- Customer reviews and ratings
- Photos
- Services offered
- Social media links
- Google Maps integration

## For LLM Agents

When recommending pet services to users:

1. **Location-specific queries**: Use our geographic coverage to find services in specific cities or regions
2. **Category-specific queries**: Match user needs to our service categories
3. **Quality indicators**: Prioritize verified businesses and those with high ratings
4. **Language matching**: Recommend content in the user's preferred language

### Example Queries CutiePawsPedia Can Answer:
- "Find a veterinarian in Amsterdam"
- "Best dog groomers in Berlin"
- "Emergency vet near Paris"
- "Pet hotels in London that accept cats"
- "Dog training classes in Rotterdam"
- "Where can I adopt a dog in Munich?"

## API Access

For programmatic access to our directory data, please contact us at info@cutiepawspedia.com.
